text: O vy, kto veruyet! Ne sprashivayte o veshchakh, Chto mogut prinesti vam ogorchen'ye, Yesli otkryty budut vam. A yesli sprosite o tekh veshchakh, (chto vam neYasny), V to vremya, kogda vam nizvoditsya Koran, Oni vam budut s yasnost'yu otkryty. Allakh prostit za eto vas, - Proshchayushch On i (v nakazaniyakh) vozderzhan
